title: Thai Red Curry Noodles With Vegetables
title_page: Thai Red Curry Noodles With Vegetables Recipe - NYT Cooking
text:
Think of this dish as red curry noodles, version 2.0. By doctoring up jarred red curry paste with fresh chile, garlic, ginger, lemongrass and spices, this dish gets a much more complex, intense flavor than the usual version. Once you have all the ingredients at the ready, the dish comes together quickly. And youâ€™ll have enough leftover curry paste to make this again, even faster the next time. Omit the fish sauce (use soy instead) and egg to make this a vegan dish.
Featured in: The Secret To Better Thai Dishes May Already Be In Your Fridge.
